open.description: Whether the Dialog is open or not.

initialFocus.description: A ref to an element that should receive focus first.
initialFocus.description_zh: 对应首先接收 focus 的元素的 ref。

as.description: The element or component the Dialog should render as.
as.description_zh: Dialog 应呈现为的元素或组件。

static.description:
Whether the element should ignore the internally managed open/closed
state.
static.description_zh:
元素是否应忽略内部管理的 open/closed
州。

unmount.description:
Whether the element should be unmounted or hidden based on the open/closed
state.
unmount.description_zh:
元素应该根据 open/closed 来卸载还是隐藏
州。

events.name: close
events.description:
Emitted when the Dialog is dismissed (via outside click of the
DialogPanel or by pressing the Escape key). Typically used to close
the dialog by setting open to false.
events.description_zh:
在关闭 Dialog 时发出（通过外部单击
DialogPanel 或按 Escape 键）。通常用于关闭
通过将 Open 设置为 false 来显示对话框。
